channel.title: Some questions
channel.description:
Okay i have some questins that some of you got the answer on :S
1.well if i want to start up another server then i want to stream my characters from the first to the second. like: if i logs on server one with char 1 at Coords 1 1 and then i logs out and logs in again on server 2 with char 1 then i want it to have same items and be on same location etc. is this possilbe like is it any tutorials cuz ive been searching around and havent found anything.
2.is it possible to delete all the maps,items,npcs trough the cache? if so, how?
3.is it possible to not hardcode items and npcs via class8 and class5? like i want it to be coded in the cache so it dosnt lagg so much.
oh and im not asking to be spoonfeeded i just want to know if its posibble and a little snippet tutorial or explaining.
thanks

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

What base are you using?

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @TimmahPwnz TimmahPwnz
item.description:
@TimmahPwnz wrote:

With the first question (Sorry if this doesn’t make any sense, I’m really tired.).

Try to find the string where it tells the server to read the player data from and have both the sources read the source from the same directory… Um, like this.

[Folders]
Source 1
Source 2
Players

Have a code in source one and two like, playerdata.equalsIgnoreCase("…\players");

or something sorry if this was as no help to you… -yawn-

Read full topic

item.title: Some questions
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Uhmm, I’m not completely sure about this, but I think you might need a Map dumper or something. Whatever those things are called, I’m not very good with alternating worlds.

Read full topic
